alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 2:21AM MST until February 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow showers and areas of blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Grand Canyon, North Rim, Shonto and Valle. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 8 AM Today: Grand Canyon 0 to 1 inches North Rim 0 to 1 inches Shonto 1 to 2 inches Valle 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country
